programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Orange is the New Max: Phoebe worries that Max will revert to his evil ways after he is asked to give a prison talk, but her efforts to protect Max from himself do more harm than good. (S4, ep 11)

programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snow Country For Old Men: In an attempt to win the holidays, Chef brings snowmen to life. But when they turn out to be evil, Chef and the kids have to jingle some bells. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bad Seed: Chef introduces the kids to agriculture by teaching them how to grow plants from seeds. But when Izzy shows her seed too much love, it turns into a monster! (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Drawing a Foul: Yuga and Roa take centre stage in the third and final battle to determine who will be the face of Rush Duels! (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Vegeta Becomes a Pupil?! Take Down Whis!: In his quest to become stronger, Vegeta bows to Whis and asks him for training. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Way Back Wendel: Courtney must deliberately lose a challenge or let the entire world go back in time. It's a hard choice for her. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Stingin' In The Rain: When Chef gets locked outside during a storm, the kids mistakenly assume he's a robber and decide to protect the Daycare - by any means necessary. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cartoon Realism: Gwen is frustrated by Beth's silly belief that cartoons are real, but they visit an animation studio and discover that Beth is right! (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oww: When the kids discover Chef's past as a disgraced pro wrestler, they invite his old tag team partner to help put on a charity show. But is the big match about reunion or revenge?! (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Jelly Aches: The school descends into chaos after getting a visit from Gazunga, the Jealousy Troll. (S2 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Simply Perfect: When the kids are about to be subject to school testing with no time to study, Courtney freaks and orders a Brainiac Ray from the back of a comic book. (S2 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ghoul Spirit: Gwen rejects the friendship of a friendly ghost. (S2 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Knit Wit: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: knitting. But after using it to save his classmates, he proudly admits it. (S3 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Fuss on the Bus: Having never booked the field trip he promised the kids, Chef has to manufacture a full day of delays on the bus trip to avoid getting to Happy Sunshine Good Time Land. (S3 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Cone-versation: Noah is forced to wear a cone of shame and feels left out of everything. But when he learns of pirate treasure buried under the school, he becomes leader of the quest. (S3 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Into the Maelstrom: The Tikis face the Sirens in a race under Maelstrom rules. Corto's lost, until Mina comes to help, keen to win back her position from Victoria. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Droners Express: To prove that she is the fastest, Corto challenges Shark to a race in Paroa. But when she realizes she puts him in danger, she joins the Pirates to help Shark. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod hyfryd ac mae'r Harbwr Feistr yn penderfynu tanio ei fan hufen iâ, Mistar Rhewllyd. It's a lovely day so the Harbour Master fires up his ice cream van. But it needs oil!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Tybed pam bod dysgu sut mae lifer yn gweithio yn arwain at wneud amser bath yr anifeiliaid yn hwyl a sbri? Blero finds out how levers work, causing bathtime to start with a splash.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau ar saffari! Ond pan mae pethau'n mynd yn fwdlyd, allen nhw gwblhau'r safari? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are on safari!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad â gwlad sy'n llawn coedwigoedd glaw trofannol a mynyddoedd hudol: Periw. Peru: We learn about the history of the Incas, about 'Machu Picchu' & an animal called a Vicuna.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Daniel wedi syrffedu ar fod yng nghysgod y Jet-lu, ac yn penderfynu dod yn arwr hefyd. Daniel Jones is fed up with being in the shadow of the Jet-lu. He decides to become a hero too.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Meurig y gath a Jini a'u cheffylau. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Today we meet Meurig the cat and Jini and her horses.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae angen help ar yr Olobobs i dyfu eu hadau Tan-tws, felly maen nhw'n creu Sblishwr Sbloshlyd i'w helpu. A Sblishwr Sbloshlyd splasher helps the Olobobs to grow some poptato seeds.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliad bach y byd, ac anifeiliaid sy'n hoffi hongian o'r coed yw'r ystlym a'r tarsier. The bat and tarsier are animals that like to hang out of trees.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Ar ei ddiwrnod mawr bydd Huw'n teithio i Sir Fon ac yn gobeithio gwireddu ei freuddwyd o gyfarfod a chyffwrdd a neidr. On his big day Huw hopes to meet and touch a snake.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw nid yw'n gwybod pam fod ei ben yn brifo. Pablo can't work out why his head hurts until Noa realises his symptoms sound like a volcano.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad bod y peiriant golchi dillad wedi torri. Mae e'n sylwi nad oes trydan gan fod y tyrbein gwynt wedi stopio. Harri gets a call that the washing machine is broken.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Gwyrdd yn weithiwr araf a phwyllog. Tybed a all ddarbwyllo Enfys i weithio'r un ffordd? Baba Gwyrdd works slowly and surely. Can Enfys be persuaded to work in the same way?

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghwmtwrch wedi cyffroi wrth i Twrch ffeindio map sy'n dynodi fod trysor yn y dref. Mystic mole Twrch Trwythog has found a map which denotes that there is treasure in the town.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae. Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Gwiber yn perswadio Crawc i ddefnyddio ei mwd adfywiol er mwyn cael ei lun ar glawr blaen cylchgrawn Arwyr Glan yr Afon. Gwiber convinces Crawc that her mud has a healing quality.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri yn cwrdd a theulu sy'n mwynhau Geocashio, ac mae Jeno a'i theulu yn ymweld a Bwlch Nant yr Arian. Today, Huw joins a group of children keeping the village of Llanberis tidy.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn dewis lliwiau ar gyfer eu tai chwarae. Red and Blue choose colours for their playhouses.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon fe awn ni i'r haul i ddweud helo i'r llew ac i'r oerfel i gwrdd â'r pengwin. We take to the sun to say hello to the lion and to the cold to meet the penguin.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Tomi Broch wedi cael llond bol ar y tywydd oer ac mae'n mynd i gynhesu o flaen y tân yn nhy Benja. When Tomi Broch decides he's had enough of the cold he takes shelter by the fire.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo eisiau gwybod beth sy'n digwydd ym mhennod nesaf ei hoff sioe deledu, ac mae ef a'r anifeiliaid yn mynd ar daith am yr ateb. Pablo wants to know more about his fave TV programme.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trên stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn teithio ar y Pip Cyflym... trên sy'n teithio ar draws Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are aboard the Zip Express.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn cwrdd ag archeolegydd sy'n cloddio mewn mynwent ger y Barri. An unusual hockey team in Cardiff is looking for new players of all ages, and we'll also hear your stories.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Aled Samuel a Bethan Scorey sy'n edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Y tro hwn byddwn yn edrych ar dai o'r cyfnod Edwardaidd. This time we focus on houses from the Edwardian period. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Heno, byddwn yn dod yn fyw o Tafwyl, Gwyl Gymraeg Caerdydd. Tonight, we'll be coming live from Tafwyl, Cardiff's Welsh Festival.

programme.title: Hewlfa Drysor
programme.desc: Lisa Angharad a'r Welsh Whisperer sy'n mynd a'u "Hewlfa Drysor" i Lanerfyl i gynnal cystadleuaeth sy'n codi'r cythraul yn eu cynefin. This time, we take the "Hewlfa Drysor" to Llanerfyl.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i Jason ddyfeisio Pelydr Gwrth-Ddisgyrchiant ma Jetboi'n benderfynol mai ei declyn personol o fydd hwn. Jason invents an Anti-Gravity Ray and Jet-boy wants to make it his personal tool.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Oi! Osgar

programme.title: Li Ban
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Li Ban heddiw? What's happening in the world of Li Ban today?

programme.title: Tekkers

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Ioan yn cael lwc wrth geisio hel tystiolaeth am ei fai ar gam, a Huw yn flin gythreulig am y peth. Anna feels that Mair is belittling her relationship with Miles.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd ar daith i'r dref - dewch gyda nhw! Mae cymaint i'w weld yn y dref, ac hefyd yn yr awyr! The Tralalas take a tour of the city and would love to ride along with you.

programme.title: Sam Tân
programme.desc: Mae Norman am greu'r syrcas 'fwyaf anghredadwy' erioed, ond fel arfer mae'n rhaid i Sam gamu mewn. Norman creates the 'most unbelievable' circus ever, but as usual it's Sam to the rescue!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae brain yn bla ar fferm Magi: all dyfais newydd Jac Jôs helpu i gael gwared arnyn nhw? Siôn helps Magi out on the farm by enlisting Jac Jôs' errant drone to deal with a troublesome crow.

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Plant o ysgolion cynradd sy'n cystadlu yn y gyfres hwyliog hon lle mae ennill sêr yn golygu ennill pwer. Primary school children compete to win stars in this out of this world series.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cân sy'n ymarfer cyfri i bump yw "5 Crocodeil". "5 Crocodeil" is a song to practice counting to five.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Pan mae Betsi yn bwrw swyn ac yn gwneud i Siriol ddiflannu ar ddamwain, mae Glenys yn cipio Llyfr Swyn. Betsi casts a spell and Glenys takes her chance and grabs Spellbook in the chaos.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno á disgyblion Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Garth Olwg i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a treasure.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar ôl i Guto ddweud celwydd sy'n arwain Dili Minllyn i grafangau Mr Cadno, rhaid iddo geisiau achub ei bywyd! Guto tells a lie which leads Dili Minllyn into the clutches of the sly old fox.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr join Pwdryn and Melys to play some candyland games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Mae'r Cywion Bach wrth eu bodd gyda threnau ac mae eu ffrindiau'n cael hwyl yn gweld trên, yn chwarae gyda thrên ac yn paentio un hefyd. The Cywion and their friends have fun with trains!

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn teimlo'n unig pan mae ei ffrindiau i gyd yn rhy brysur i chwarae ag e. Og feels lonely when all his friends are too busy to play with him.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Er gwaetha ymdrech Mam i gael yr efeilliaid i beidio bod mor wastraffus gyda'r trydan ma'r ddau'n gyndyn o wrando. The two are transported to a new electric world, meeting a new character!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn brwydro i achub haid o ddolffiniaid troelli sy'n ymddangos eu bod yn nofio yn eu cwsg. A struggle to save a pod of spinner dolphins who seem to be swimming in their sleep.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Cai a Megan yn edrych ymlaen at barti Calan Gaeaf, ond does dim pwmpen gyda nhw... eto. Cai and Megan are looking forward to a Halloween party, but they don't yet have a pumpkin!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae'r enfys yn ffurfio, be sy'n neud y gwair yn wyrdd, am fwydydd lliwgar, a llawer mwy. We learn about the 'Aurora Borealis' - the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Penderfyna Sali Mali a'i ffrindiau blannu hadau yn yr ardd. Ni all Jac Do aros i'r tyfu, felly mae'n penderfynu cyflymu pethau! Sali Mali and friends decide to plant seeds in the garden.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae 'na swn hyfryd yn dod o'r Cywiadur heddiw. Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn sydd yno ac maen nhw'n canu'n swynol iawn. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn are singing. Can Jen a Jim form a choir too?

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Gwil a'r Pawenlu chwarae gêm pêl-fasged yn erbyn tîm pêl-fasged Maer Campus. The PAW Patrol and Gwil have to play a basketball against Mayor Campus's basketball team.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd morladron bach Ysgol Llwyncelyn yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys yn ôl? Can the little pirates from Ysgol Llwyncelyn help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Coedwig hardd yr Olobobs yn llawn sbwriel! A all Tib, Lalw a Bobl ddarganfod pwy yw'r troseddwr a datrys pethe? The Olobobs discover giant-sized litter all over their beautiful forest!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn darllen stori am 'Folant Fagddu' pan mae'n clywed swn rhuo y tu allan. Digbi is reading a story about a battle against 'Folant Fagddu' when he hears a roar outside.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pethau'n arnofio?'. Dyna mae Ela am wybod heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu stori sili arall i'w rannu am bysgod anweledig. Today, Tadcu is on hand to tell a silly story about invisible fish.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod cyntaf yr haf ac mae pawb yn edrych ymlaen at ddathlu. It's the first day of summer and everyone's looking forward to the celebration party.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn ffeindio be' ma nhw'n feddwl yw seren goll ar y traeth ac yn ceisio'i dychwelyd i'r awyr. The Woohoos find what they think is a fallen star on the beach and try to return it.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn yn cytuno codi arian i warchodfa asynnod drwy redeg ras noddedig. A fydd cyngor Sid, sy'n rhedwr profiadol, yn ei helpu? Siôn agrees to take part in a sponsored run for donkeys.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Arloeswyr Pontypandy yn trio ennill bathodynnau adeiladu raft. Ond mae charjyr diffygiol Jams yn achosi tan. The Pontypandy pioneers are trying to win badges for building a raft.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan mae criw o nadroedd gwenwynig yn cael eu darganfod yn sownd ar draeth, rhaid i Pegwn a'r Octonots eu hebrwng yn ôl i'r cefnfor. Pegwn has to get some poisonous snakes back to the sea.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu

programme.title: Sam Tan

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: 1993. Comedy. Directed by Penelope Spheeris. Stars Diedrich Bader, Erika Eleniak, Jim Varney & Lily Tomlin. A Southern hillbilly family strikes it rich in oil and moves to Beverly Hills. [S]

programme.title: The Rogues
programme.desc: 1965. The Project Man. Gig Young, David Niven and Charles Boyer are The Rogues, members of two related families of international forgers and conmen. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: South of the Border. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun & Jack Elam. When an outlaw gang robs a bank and kills a mother and her child, Bill stops at nothing to find them and crosses the border into Mexico. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Gypsy's Warning. 1964. Stars David Kossoff, Peggy Mount & Eileen Way. Ada's furious when she's not allowed a share of a win on a horse and Alf's rudeness results in him being cursed by a gypsy. [S]

programme.title: The Gorbals Story
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Stars Howard Connell & Russell Hunter. A Merton Park Studios Production. A young artist is almost driven to murder from the pressures of living in the Glasgow slum area. [S]

programme.title: Inquest
programme.desc: 1940. Drama directed by Roy Boulting. A young widow accused of murder is defended by a distinguished KC. Stars Elizabeth Allan. [S]

programme.title: Hammer The Toff
programme.desc: 1952. Crime Drama by Maclean Rogers. The Toff (John Bentley) tries to help Susan (Patricia Dainton) reunite with her uncle who's been targeted by criminals that are after his steel formula. [S]

programme.title: Impulse (1955)
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by Charles De la Tour & Cy Endfield. Stars Arthur Kennedy, Constance Smith & Joy Shelton. A night club singer tricks an estate agent into thinking he killed a jewel thief. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton at Bay
programme.desc: 1950. Action. Director: Godfrey Grayson. Stars Don Stannard, Tamara Desni & George Ford. Dick Barton is assigned to find a kidnapped professor and deactivate a death ray before catastrophe occurs. [S]

programme.title: An Honourable Murder
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Norman Wooland, Margaretta Scott & Lisa Daniely. A modern reworking of Shakespeare's Julius Caesar set in the corporate world of the City of London. [S]

programme.title: Sleeping Car To Trieste
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Director: John Paddy Carstairs. Stars Jean Kent, Bonar Colleano, Albert Lieven & David Tomlinson. Agents break into an embassy in Paris to steal a diary filled with political secrets. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Race for Queen. 1964. Stars Donna Douglas, Robert Cummings & Susan Hart. Elly May decides to enter a beauty competition to become 'The Queen of Beverly Hills', but Granny also wants to enter. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1956. Person Unknown. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Russell Napier, Edward Cast and Alan Robinson. A Polish spy changed places with a would-be assassin. (S1, E18)

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Gunmen. 1960. Stars Dan Blocker, Michael Landon & Lorne Greene. Hoss and Little Joe are mistaken for bloodthirsty hired killers in a small Texas town dominated by two feuding families. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Forest Fire/Farm Sale/Fishing in a Gale. 1986. Jack Hargreaves reflects on his large collection of country films made during his long career in television and chooses three more to show us. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Join Noel and Mike for a treat with Acker Bilk in a glamorous 60s promotional film, there's a reel from Nettlefold studios that promises 'all shall go to the ball'! And who remembers Zokko? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1973. Detective & Mystery Drama. Egg & Cress Sandwiches. Stars Alfred Burke, Robert Flemyng, Ray Smith & Brian Blessed. An unconventional vicar brings trouble to Marker. [S]

programme.title: A Dandy in Aspic
programme.desc: 1968. Thriller. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Mia Farrow, Laurence Harvey, Tom Courtenay. British Intelligence orders its operatives to eliminate a Soviet spy, unaware he's one of their own men. [S]

programme.title: Let's Spend the Night Together
programme.desc: 1982. Documentary. Directed by Hal Ashby. Stars Mick Jagger, Keith Richards & Charlie Watts. Relive the concerts of the Rolling Stones on their American tour in New Jersey and Arizona in 1981. [S]

programme.title: Full Moon in Blue Water
programme.desc: 1988. Drama. Directed by Peter Masterson. Stars Gene Hackman, Teri Garr & Burgess Meredith. A lonely widower with a failing bar encounters a bus driver who is determined to turn it all around. [S]

programme.title: Full Moon in Blue Water
programme.desc: 1988. Drama. Directed by Peter Masterson. Stars Gene Hackman, Teri Garr & Burgess Meredith. A lonely widower with a failing bar encounters a bus driver who is determined to turn it all around. [S]

programme.title: My Man Godfrey
programme.desc: 1936. Drama. Directed by Gregory La Cava. Stars William Powell, Carol Lombard & Alice Brady. An eccentric socialite hires a drifter as a family butler, but there's more to him than meets the eye. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by William A. Seiter. Stars George Montgomery, Alan Hale Jr. & Gloria Talbott. Young waitresses at a hotel in the Old West cause problems for a handsome whiskey salesman.

programme.title: Look At Life Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: 1962. A focus on all the things you can do, if you are really determined, to take off those extra ounces and keep them at bay! Unveiling there is more to the slimming business than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp Comes to Wichita. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Don Haggerty & Collette Lyons. When Wyatt Earp takes over as marshal of Wichita, his first challenge is a local group of vigilantes. [S]

programme.title: Strictly For The Birds
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director Vernon Sewell. Stars Tony Tanner, Joan Sims and Graham Stark. After a fortunate gambling win, Terry Blessing's luck runs out when an ex-girlfriend shows up with a surprise. [S]

programme.title: The Girl On The Pier
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Veronica Hurst, Ron Randell & Marjorie Rhodes. Rivalry between a Brighton crooner who has done time and his partner in crime, who is being blackmailed. [S]

programme.title: Vengeance Is Mine
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Director: Alan Cullimore. Stars Valentine Dyall, Anne Firth, Richard Goolden & Sam Kydd. A dying man hires an assassin to kill so he can frame his death on an enemy. [S]

programme.title: The Silent Invasion
programme.desc: 1962. War. Director: Max Varnel. Stars Eric Flynn, Petra Davies, Francis De Wolff. When the Nazi's take over a small village during WWII, a local girl inadvertently falls in love with an officer. [S]

programme.title: The Return of October
programme.desc: 1948. Comedy. Director: Joseph H. Lewis. Stars Glenn Ford, Terry Moore & Albert Sharpe. A young woman must prove her sanity after claiming that a racehorse is the reincarnation of her late uncle. [S]

programme.title: King Rat
programme.desc: 1965. War. Directed by Bryan Forbes. Stars George Segal, Tom Courtenay & James Fox. A U.S. corporal operates a number of lucrative rackets within a WWII POW camp to raise money for their freedom. [S]

programme.title: Genevieve
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Director Henry Cornelius. Stars Kenneth More, Dinah Sheridan and Kay Kendall. Alan and Ambrose are not going to let friendship get in the way of winning the London to Brighton rally. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The £20,000 Kiss. 1963. Directed by John Moxey. Stars Dawn Addams, Alfred Burke & Anthony Newlands. Count Arnim has formed a highly efficient organisation for extorting money by blackmail. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: Mistaken Identity. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley & Lois Daine. A charred body found in an auto wreck in France is reported to be that of an English businessman. Agent Smith is sent to investigate. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: An Egg Grows in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Edward Everett Horton. Egghead and his yeggs steal the Gotham City charter in a twisted plot to gain control of the city. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: 77 Bus. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Robert Cawdron & Ivan Craig. Police are baffled by robberies known as 'the Red Rose series'; Maguire and his partner suspect a seemingly innocent jeweller. [S]

programme.title: California Suite
programme.desc: 1978. Comedy. Directed by Herbert Ross. Stars Jane Fonda, Maggie Smith & Michael Caine. The misadventures and struggles of four sets of guests staying at the luxury Beverly Hills Hotel. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: There's history, murder, jealousy, monsters, jazz music and bikini dancers down in The Cellar Club tonight. Caroline Munro introduces the first offering, Dark Prince: The True Story of Dracula. [S]

programme.title: Dark Prince: The True Story of Dracula
programme.desc: 2000. Horror. Directed by Joe Chappelle. Stars Rudolf Martin, Jane March & Christopher Brand. Romanian Prince, Vlad Dracula, must fight a bloody battle in order to regain his kingdom. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: We travel to California and head to the beach for our next film The Beach Girls and the Monster. Caroline Munro presents the 1965 horror directed by and starring Jon Hall. [S]

programme.title: The Beach Girls and the Monster
programme.desc: 1965. Horror. Directed by & stars Jon Hall. Features Sue Casey & Walker Edmiston. When kids begin to be slaughtered on the beach, Dr Lindsay must figure out if a sea monster is behind the murders. [S]

programme.desc: Unbearable Beach: On a nice summer's day Bear, as usual, goes fishing. But the fishing trip didn't quite work out: the forest dwellers made a "beach" at Bear's favourite spot. (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: When a Pig Flies: Rosie has lost her peace because of the ripe, appetising acorns growing right above her little snout. (S6 Ep1)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: All You Need is a Goal: The ball is on the field, the players are in the field, the Bear in the chair is rooting for his favourite team. But Masha got bored in anticipation of a goal. (S6 Ep2)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Soup Pursuit: The wolves are going to cook borscht under Masha's guidance. They have a cookbook, a big pot and a ravenous appetite. But they still gotta get the ingredients! (S6 Ep3)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Tricky Tricks: Bear's old circus friend Tiger comes to visit. What could be more wonderful than to passionately play chess with your best friend? But Masha has her own idea of miracles. (S6 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Think Outside the Box: Masha and Penguin go to Mars and from there they go straight to the open sea to the Frog Princess, and new adventures are already waiting for friends overboard. (S6 Ep5)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Newton's Discovery: Newton's powers have been neutralised because of Romeo's blockade of the asteroids. (S5 Ep45)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Romeo's Pirate Trap: Pirate Robot wants to upgrade his ship - with stuff from the Flying Factory. (S5 Ep46)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna's Moon Attack: Luna secretly steals Motsuki's teleport power. Gekko and Catboy investigate, but mess up with catastrophic results - can they put it right? (S5 Ep47)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna's Moon Attack Part II: Luna secretly steals Motsuki's teleport power. Gekko and Catboy investigate, but mess up with catastrophic results - can they put it right? (S5 Ep48)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: The Flying Playhouse: Jett delivers a cardboard playhouse to twin sisters. Trouble arises when the sisters try to put all their toys in the playhouse. Donnie and Donnie Pet come to help. (S5 Ep38)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Farm Friends Fetch: Jett and Jett Pet deliver a special farmer's outfit to a girl named Greta. When the animals escape from her family's farm, Jett and Sunny corral them all back to safety. (S5 Ep39)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Royal Puppy Campers: Jett delivers some camper vans to his old friend, Princess Maribelle. Maribelle takes her puppies and her buddy Prince Dominic on a camping trip, but trouble strikes... (S5 Ep40)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Fire Drill Heroes: Jett delivers a firefighter's suit to a girl named Lydia whose Mum is a firefighter in the Amazon Rainforest. (S6 Ep1)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cuzzy Carson: When Cory's older cousin comes to visit, Cory tries to replay all the old games they used to play together when he was Chrissy's age, even though he's twice as big now. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bedtime Story: The Carson family makes up a bedtime story for Chrissy. (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Yipíta Cartinez: Cory, Freddie, and Halle struggle to communicate with Carlos and Carmina's "sobrina", their niece, who is visiting from out of the country and doesn't speak English. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Pumpkin Mania: Bubble supersizes the hotel pumpkins to make her guest happy - but her magic might have gone too far when a runaway pumpkin breaks free and starts destroying the room. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Room at the Top: When Bubble tries to climb up a mountain with her guest, Hilary, as fast as possible, they wind up on the wrong path with a yeti in pursuit. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: The Living Sea: A day at the beach goes awry when sea blubbs begin beaching themselves due to the warming sea water, prompting True and Bartleby to investigate. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Esme and Roy
programme.desc: Are We There Yet?: Esme and Roy are taking Simon to a museum exhibit all about explorers, but Simon can't wait to get there. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy Compilations
programme.desc: You Can Be Anything/Even When It Rains/Feel Like An Animal/Primary Colours/Zoom Zoom Zoom: Jeremy and Jazzy believe that if they start small, they can achieve their dreams! (S1 Ep106)

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Saving SnuggleSaurus: When Rocky has to watch his baby cousin for the day, he asks Tiny to keep an eye on little Rolo's toy. Rolo is obsessed with the toy and can't nap without it. (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Good Dino: Tiny wants to create a statue of Cretacia's Greatest Hero out of a big boulder on a cliff. And she has just the model in mind: Giganto! (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: News of the Day: A journalist has announced that the person who makes the most interesting report about the life of the city will appear on TV. Ricky goes searching for local news. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Dreaming about Space: Grandpa Saur has always dreamed of some extraordinary adventure! For many years, grandfather has been looking in a telescope in the hope of spotting an alien. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Ricky the Chameleon: Boo has his dad's wildlife photography cloak. It lets you camouflage with any environment. Ricky has talked his friend into lending him the camouflage cloak for a day. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Pioneers: When Molang and Piu Piu go to the conquest of the West, they arrive last... but they know how to remain number one in their friends' hearts. (S5 Ep24)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Rag Doll: When delivering a pizza to the village engineer, Piu Piu is zapped with a laser ray. He finds himself in the huge rag doll the inventor was working on. (S5 Ep25)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Hen With Chocolate Eggs: As a reward for their generosity, a magician offers Molang and Piu Piu a magic bean. It grows until the sky and they discover a goose that lays chocolate eggs. (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Strand of Hair: Molang and Piu Piu are working in the kitchen until a gust of wind tousles with Piu Piu's hair. He can't help but look at his reflection... (S5 Ep27)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Merman: In the Middle-Ages, Molang and Piu Piu meet a triton whose dream is to visit the town. No problem! Molang and Piu Piu show him around the city while carrying him in a bathtub. (S5 Ep28)

programme.title: The Miniwhats

programme.title: The Miniwhats

programme.title: The Miniwhats

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Sunburn: It's very hot outside, so Ollie draws a fan. It blows away Pamela and Raoul's hat. They set off to find the hat and are chased by a Sunburn, a gigantic monster. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
